thread.title: Steven Tyler Sends Donald Trump Cease and Desist Over Campaign Use of ‘Dream On’
thread.title_full: Steven Tyler Sends Donald Trump Cease and Desist Over Campaign Use of ‘Dream On’ - Worldnews.com

author: wn.com
title: Steven Tyler Sends Donald Trump Cease and Desist Over Campaign Use of ‘Dream On’
text: Aerosmith frontman Steven Tyler wants Donald Trump to stop using the group’s song “ Dream On ” at campaign events. An attorney for Tyler sent a cease-and-desist letter to the GOP presidential frontrunner’s campaign committee on Saturday. It’s
